settings.hideFoodAndArmor: Esconder Barra de Comida y Armadura
settings.hideAuctionHousePlayers: Ocultar Jugadores Cerca de NPCs Importantes

messages.dropConfirmation: Arroja este objeto otra vez para confirmar!
messages.labymod: Usuarios de Labymod: Ocultar Barra de Comida y Armadura no es compatible.
messages.minionCannotReach: Un minion de %type% no puede alcanzar sus mobs y se ha detenido!
messages.minionIsFull: Un minion en tu isla está lleno!
messages.separateMultiple: Usa una coma para incluir varios.
messages.deleteOldFile: The download has finished, please open your mods folder using the button below, close your Minecraft, and delete the old version (or delete it later if you prefer).

update.majorAvailable: A new major update, %version% is available! The link for the download can be found in chat.
update.patchAvailable: A new patch update, %version% is available! Look for the download link or to attempt to download the patch automatically!
update.downloading: The patch is downloading! Status: %downloaded%/%total% Please note that after the download has finished, you must delete the old file.
update.failed: The patch download has failed! Please download it manually using the link in chat.
update.downloadFinished: The patch has finished downloading. It has been saved as %file%. Please don't forget to delete the old file after closing your Minecraft. Click the message in chat to open up the folder.

messages.cancelledStemBreak: SkyblockAddons ha detenido la destrucción del tallo. Usa sólo tus manos si en realidad quieres romperlo.
messages.cancelledCaneBreak: SkyblockAddons te ha impedido romper este bloque de caña de azúcar. Usa otra herramienta si realmente te gustaría romperla.
messages.cancelledProfileOpening: SkyblockAddons ha evitado que abras el perfil de este jugador con tu arco en la mano.
messages.cancelledDropping: SkyblockAddons ha evitado que arrojes este objeto o herramienta rara.
messages.clickMoreTimes: Haz clic/arroja el objeto %times% veces más si en realidad quieres hacerlo.
